Introduction
This topic contains information on obtaining VA medical records, including
VA medical records and the requirement to obtain relevant records
electronic recordkeeping of treatment at VAMCs
information and records available via
CAPRI
, and
JLV
determining whether an electronic
VA Form 10-7131, Exchange of Beneficiary Information and Request for Administrative Action
, should be submitted
checking the status and following up on electronic
VA Form 10-7131
requests
concluding VA medical records do not exist
determining if a final notification letter for VAMC records is warranted
, and
preparing a final notification letter for VAMC or VR&E records
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Requesting Evidence From Federal Record Custodians
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
